fields.name: Hunter's Charm (+1)
fields.desc: This small fetish is made out of bones, feathers, and semi-precious gems. Typically worn around the neck, this charm can also be wrapped around your brow or wrist or affixed to a weapon. While wearing or carrying this charm, you have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made against your favored enemies. The bonus is determined by the charm's rarity.
